2025-11-08T01:58:00.975947632Z     {
2025-11-08T01:58:00.975950162Z       _id: '019a2cde-67d5-7cc7-93f5-cc64980c02f3',
2025-11-08T01:58:00.975952652Z       title: 'Cell Membranes & Transport Mechanisms',
2025-11-08T01:58:00.975955352Z       content: '# Lecture 5 ‚Äî Cell Membranes & Transport Mechanisms\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.975958352Z         '**Course:** BIOL 201 ‚Äî Principles of Cell Biology  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.975961203Z         '**Instructor:** Prof. A. Nguyen  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.975963823Z         '**Date:** Sept 22\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.975966323Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.975968853Z         '---\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.975971673Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.975974163Z         '## Overview\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.975980433Z         'How cells maintain homeostasis through selective permeability, transport proteins, and electrochemical gradients.\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.975982964Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.975985544Z         '---\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.975988034Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.975990694Z         '## üîπ Membrane Structure\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.975993714Z         '- Fluid mosaic model ‚Üí phospholipid bilayer + embedded proteins  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.975996294Z         '- Amphipathic molecules:\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.975998965Z         '  - **Heads:** hydrophilic (phosphate group)\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976001585Z         '  - **Tails:** hydrophobic (fatty acids)\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976010075Z         '- Cholesterol:\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976012855Z         '  - Stabilizes membrane at high temps\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976015555Z         '  - Prevents packing at low temps ‚Üí maintains fluidity\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976018126Z         '- Membrane asymmetry:\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976020816Z         '  - Outer leaflet ‚Üí glycolipids, glycoproteins\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976023746Z         '  - Inner leaflet ‚Üí signaling lipids (e.g., phosphatidylserine)\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976026206Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976028546Z         '---\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976031126Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976033687Z         '## üîπ Passive Transport\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976036227Z         '- **Simple diffusion:** movement down concentration gradient  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976040947Z         '- **Facilitated diffusion:** uses membrane proteins, still passive  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976043377Z         '  - Channel proteins ‚Üí open passage (e.g., aquaporins)  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976046107Z         '  - Carrier proteins ‚Üí bind ‚Üí conformational change  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976048587Z         '- **Osmosis:** water moves toward higher solute concentration  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976051257Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976054218Z         '**Example:**  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976056968Z         '`GLUT1` transports glucose into red blood cells via facilitated diffusion.\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976059528Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976062188Z         '---\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976064868Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976067588Z         '## üîπ Active Transport\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976070289Z         '- Requires **energy (ATP or ion gradient)**  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976072919Z         '- **Primary active transport:**\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976075319Z         '  - Direct ATP hydrolysis  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976077819Z         '  - e.g., Na‚Å∫/K‚Å∫-ATPase ‚Üí pumps 3 Na‚Å∫ out, 2 K‚Å∫ in\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976080319Z         '- **Secondary active transport:**\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976082869Z         '  - Uses energy from another gradient  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976085799Z         '  - e.g., Na‚Å∫/glucose symporter in intestinal cells\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976088319Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.97609068Z         '**Mnemonic:**  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.97609339Z         '> ‚ÄúPrimary = Power (uses ATP directly)‚Äù  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.97609589Z         '> ‚ÄúSecondary = Sneaky (uses another gradient)‚Äù\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.9760984Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.9761014Z         '---\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.97610412Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976106671Z         '## üîπ Bulk Transport\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976109231Z         '- **Endocytosis:** cell takes in material via vesicles  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976111771Z         '  - Phagocytosis (‚Äúcell eating‚Äù)  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976114331Z         '  - Pinocytosis (‚Äúcell drinking‚Äù)  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976129162Z         '  - Receptor-mediated endocytosis (specific uptake)\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976132192Z         '- **Exocytosis:** vesicles fuse ‚Üí release contents (e.g., neurotransmitters)\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976134672Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976137132Z         '---\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976139782Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976142242Z         '## üîπ Membrane Potential\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976144702Z         '- Established by:\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976147473Z         '  - Na‚Å∫/K‚Å∫-ATPase pump\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976155663Z         '  - Leak channels (K‚Å∫ mostly)\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976158513Z         '- Creates electrical gradient (inside more negative)\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976161174Z         '- Vital for neurons + muscle cells\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976163774Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976166384Z         '---\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976168874Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976171164Z         '### üß† Exam Tip\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976174044Z         'If energy (ATP) is used directly ‚Üí *primary active transport*  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976176744Z         'If gradient of another molecule is used ‚Üí *secondary active transport*\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976179204Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976181695Z         '---\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976184095Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976186635Z         '# üåø Lecture 10 ‚Äî Photosynthesis & Energy Conversion\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976189445Z         '**Course:** BIOL 210 ‚Äî Plant Physiology  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976191965Z         '**Instructor:** Dr. Chen  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976194455Z         '**Date:** Oct 4\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976196965Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976199565Z         '---\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976202086Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976204606Z         '## Overview\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976207366Z         'Conversion of solar ‚Üí chemical energy in chloroplasts.\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976209956Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976212636Z         '---\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976215206Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976217566Z         '## üîπ Two Main Stages\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976219987Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976222447Z         '### 1Ô∏è‚É£ Light Reactions (Thylakoid Membrane)\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976224957Z         '- Input: light + H‚ÇÇO  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976227487Z         '- Output: ATP + NADPH + O‚ÇÇ  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976230307Z         '- **Steps:**\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976232867Z         '  - Photon excites chlorophyll in PSII\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976235558Z         '  - Water splitting ‚Üí O‚ÇÇ + e‚Åª + H‚Å∫ (via oxygen-evolving complex)\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976238068Z         '  - e‚Åª passed down ETC ‚Üí ATP (chemiosmosis)\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976240578Z         '  - PSI re-energizes e‚Åª ‚Üí NADP‚Å∫ ‚Üí NADPH\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976243098Z         '- **Location:** thylakoid membrane\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976245828Z         '- **Products:** ATP & NADPH ‚Üí used in Calvin Cycle\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976248398Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976250878Z         '### 2Ô∏è‚É£ Calvin Cycle (Stroma)\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976253788Z         '- Input: CO‚ÇÇ + ATP + NADPH  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976256389Z         '- Output: G3P (‚Üí glucose)  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976258929Z         '- **Phases:**\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976261449Z         '  1. **Carbon fixation:** RuBisCO fixes CO‚ÇÇ ‚Üí 3-PGA  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976263879Z         '  2. **Reduction:** ATP + NADPH reduce 3-PGA ‚Üí G3P  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976266379Z         '  3. **Regeneration:** some G3P ‚Üí regenerate RuBP  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976269269Z         '- **Location:** stroma\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976271649Z         '- **Key enzyme:** RuBisCO (slow but crucial)\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.97627409Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.97627665Z         '---\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.97627905Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.97628141Z         '## üîπ Photorespiration\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.97628414Z         '- Occurs when O‚ÇÇ binds to RuBisCO instead of CO‚ÇÇ  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976291281Z         '- Wastes energy, releases CO‚ÇÇ  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976294001Z         '- More likely under:\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976296471Z         '  - High temps\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976299111Z         '  - Low CO‚ÇÇ levels\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976302571Z         '- **C4 & CAM plants** reduce this via spatial/temporal CO‚ÇÇ concentration mechanisms.\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976305261Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976308002Z         '---\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976310582Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976313002Z         '## üîπ Energy Summary Table\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976315432Z         '| Stage             | Location          | Inputs                 | Outputs                 |\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976318002Z         '|-------------------|------------------|------------------------|--------------------------|\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976320582Z         '| Light Reactions   | Thylakoid Membrane | Light, H‚ÇÇO, ADP, NADP‚Å∫ | O‚ÇÇ, ATP, NADPH          |\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976323222Z         '| Calvin Cycle      | Stroma             | CO‚ÇÇ, ATP, NADPH        | G3P, ADP, NADP‚Å∫         |\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976325812Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976328383Z         '---\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976330943Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976333513Z         '### üß† Fun Fact\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976335963Z         'Plants reflect green light because chlorophyll *a* and *b* absorb mostly red and blue wavelengths.\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976338513Z         '\n' +

2025-11-08T01:58:00.976358624Z       title: 'Introduction to Biology & The Scientific Method',
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976361365Z       content: '# Lecture 1 ‚Äî Introduction to Biology & The Scientific Method\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976364045Z         '**Course:** BIOL 101 ‚Äî Foundations of Biology  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976366525Z         '**Instructor:** Dr. L. Patel  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976368745Z         '**Date:** Sept 2\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976370875Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976372975Z         '---\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976375215Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976377455Z         '## Overview\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976379826Z         'Biology = study of living organisms and their interactions with the environment.  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976389456Z         'Goal: understand how life is organized, functions, evolves, and sustains itself.\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976392496Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976394766Z         '---\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976397076Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976399447Z         '## üîπ Characteristics of Life\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976401677Z         '1. Cellular organization  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976404047Z         '2. Metabolism (energy use)  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976406397Z         '3. Homeostasis (internal balance)  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976408697Z         '4. Growth & development  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976411187Z         '5. Reproduction  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976413387Z         '6. Response to stimuli  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976415857Z         '7. Evolutionary adaptation  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976424458Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976427158Z         '---\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976429338Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976431578Z         '## üîπ Levels of Biological Organization\n',

2025-11-08T01:58:00.976447259Z       title: 'DNA Structure & Replication',
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976449539Z       content: '# Lecture 2 ‚Äî DNA Structure & Replication\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976451749Z         '**Course:** BIOL 110 ‚Äî Molecular Biology  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.97645411Z         '**Instructor:** Prof. A. Rivera  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.97645637Z         '**Date:** Sept 9\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.97645859Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.97646088Z         '---\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.97646316Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.97646543Z         '## Overview\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.97646792Z         'DNA = hereditary material carrying genetic instructions.  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.97647036Z         'Replication ensures identical transmission during cell division.\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.97647292Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976475401Z         '---\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976477951Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976480651Z         '## üîπ DNA Structure\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976483381Z         '- Double helix (Watson & Crick, 1953)\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976485581Z         '- Nucleotides:\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976488081Z         '  - **Sugar:** deoxyribose  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976490432Z         '  - **Phosphate group**\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976492681Z         '  - **Nitrogenous base:** A, T, C, G  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976494982Z         '- Base pairing:  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976497122Z         '  - A ‚Üî T (2 hydrogen bonds)  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976499342Z         '  - C ‚Üî G (3 hydrogen bonds)\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976501612Z         '- Antiparallel strands:  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976504002Z         '  - 5‚Äô ‚Üí 3‚Äô and 3‚Äô ‚Üí 5‚Äô\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976506232Z         '- Complementarity allows accurate replication\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976508502Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976510762Z         '---\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976512963Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976515423Z         '## üîπ DNA Replication (Semi-conservative)\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976517973Z         '- Each daughter DNA = 1 old + 1 new strand  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976520323Z         '- **Enzymes involved:**\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976522583Z         '  - **Helicase:** unwinds DNA  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976525173Z         '  - **Primase:** adds RNA primer  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976527723Z         '  - **DNA polymerase:** adds nucleotides (5‚Äô‚Üí3‚Äô)  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976530094Z         '  - **Ligase:** seals Okazaki fragments on lagging strand  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976532754Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976535304Z         '**Leading strand:** continuous synthesis  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976537804Z         '**Lagging strand:** discontinuous (Okazaki fragments)\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976540054Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976542194Z         '---\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976544524Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976546695Z         '## üîπ Origins of Replication\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976553675Z         '- Prokaryotes ‚Üí single origin  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976556305Z         '- Eukaryotes ‚Üí multiple origins  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976558595Z         '- Bidirectional replication forks\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976560835Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976563076Z         '---\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976565256Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976567646Z         '## üîπ Proofreading & Repair\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976570046Z         '- DNA polymerase has 3‚Äô‚Üí5‚Äô exonuclease activity  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976572296Z         '- Mismatch repair fixes post-replication errors  \n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976574586Z         '- UV damage ‚Üí thymine dimers ‚Üí repaired by photolyase or excision repair\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976576846Z         '\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.976579116Z         '---\n' +
2025-11-08T01:58:00.977210851Z         '3. **Control flow:**\n' +
